recipesJson.name: Perfectly peachy pineapple v2
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
So thought I'd start a v2 of the first recipe I ever shared online.

Peach layer:
I kept cap juicy peach as it gives us a nice bright rounded peach flavour. 

Cap yellow peach used to boost juicy peach & its works amazingly as a bridge between the peach n pineapple.

Pineapple layer:
WF pineapple Candy gives us a nice bright pineapple note. 

Cap golden pineapple is here to just help fill out the pineapple. 

No sweetener needed as majority of the flavours in this have a nice natural sweetness to them.

If you're an unlucky one who gets harshness from peach n pineapple I'd recommend leaving it to steep for a few days.
